description: This file is a recipe or configuration include for setting architecture-specific compiler and build options for PowerPC with a focus on the ppc-e500 processor. It defines tuning parameters, compiler flags, and features for the specific hardware target.

methods.name: bb.utils.contains
methods.description: Checks if a list or string contains a specific value.

methods.name: bb.utils.filter
methods.description: Filters a list or string based on a pattern or list of patterns.
